document.full_text: yandex  said on friday the underwriters of its recent blockbuster nasdaq ipo had exercised an over-allotment option in full, bringing the total raised to $1.43 billion.
document.title: yandex over-allotment option takes ipo to $1.43 billion
lines_and_colors: yandex  said on friday the underwriters of its recent blockbuster nasdaq ipo had exercised an over-allotment option in full, bringing the total raised to $1.43 billion.
